info.name: Night 1.3
info.description:
A dark theme that's more easy on the eyes than the default Darkish theme. 
Some issue(s)
------------
1) Style will not work with non-HTTPS. Can be edited manually with Stylish/GreaseMonkey/any other style program.
info.additionalInfo:
The front page does not have the style implemented because the style page breaks the formatting.

Changes
-------
v1.3:
Added some changes for the *new* Patreon footer.

v1.2:
Finally got around to front-page CSS and changed absolute logo URLs to relative (thanks userstyle syntax).

v1.1: 
Changed watched thread box color.
Changed posting mode title bar color.
